introduction: What a strange and interesting life. We are constantly striving to provide for life by working from morning till night. Is this the human happiness that everyone dreams of so much? - the protagonist asked himself every day. Finding a picture of his childhood at home, Robert remembers his dream of becoming a singer that will change his life. Overcoming barriers to a happy future, he truly falls in love. But the dark forces want to take everything, deceiving the guy. What is Robert ready for his dream?
